text: I just checked in some improvements to Timeline that bring it almost to Ryan's slide 6 (left example)
Making every 3rd card be full-width is trickier because the recycling view doesn't always tell me exactly which view it's rendering, so I'm still working on understanding that
I'm heading out for today, but I can post an APK later if Ryan really wants it... by default, I'll keep moving forward with this tomorrow!
